description:
Loan calculator for home, car, etc.. Loan tab calculates the monthly payment given loan amount, term length and interest APR %. Loan start date can be changed from current date which is the default. Reset button resets all the data under all the tabs.

Analysis tab shows the total payments which includes total principal and total interest for the first n months. It also shows the remaining loan balance and draws the principal/interest percentages in a nice pie chart. The value of n can be changed thru # months input box. Press update button after changing the value of n. This can be very useful to analyze various loan scenarios.

Amortize tab shows the loan amortization schedule for every month in the loan term. For every month, the table shows the month/year, interest, prinicipal, total interest paid until that month and the remaining loan balance. The table can be scrolled up or down quickly to scan thru the entire table.

Any feedback is welcome.
